      The unique identification number of this SwarmStoreListing.

      The SwarmStoreItem that is contained by this SwarmStoreListing.
      int orderId
      Identifies this Listing's position in the Swarm Store list.
      int price
      The number of SwarmCoins that it will cost the user to purchase this SwarmStoreListing.
      static int PURCHASE_CANCELED
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB if the purchase was intentionally cancelled by the user.
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_ALREADY_PURCHASED
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails because the item has already been purchased (and the StoreItem isn't consumable - can't have multiples).
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_ITEM
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase a SwarmStoreListing that contained an invalid SwarmStoreItem.
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_STORE
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase an invalid SwarmStoreListing.
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_COINS
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase a SwarmStoreListing but has an insufficient number of Swarm Coins.
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_INTERNET
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails because of a loss of internet connectivity.
      static int PURCHASE_FAILED_OTHER
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails for an unspecified reason.
      static int PURCHASE_SUCCESS
      The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB if the purchase was successful.
      int quantity
      The quantity of SwarmStoreItems associated with this SwarmStoreListing.
      java.lang.String title
      The title of this SwarmStoreListing.

    • Field Detail

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_ALREADY_PURCHASED

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_ALREADY_PURCHASED
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails because the item has already been purchased (and the StoreItem isn't consumable - can't have multiples).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_INTERNET

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_INTERNET
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails because of a loss of internet connectivity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_OTHER

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_OTHER
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the purchase fails for an unspecified reason.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_ITEM

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_ITEM
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase a SwarmStoreListing that contained an invalid SwarmStoreItem. If this value is returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback, it may indicate that there are configuration or setup problems with your SwarmStoreItem, SwarmStoreListing, or SwarmStore.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_STORE

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_INVALID_STORE
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase an invalid SwarmStoreListing. If this value is returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback, it may indicate that there are configuration or setup problems with your SwarmStoreItem, SwarmStoreListing, or SwarmStore.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_COINS

        public static final int PURCHASE_FAILED_NO_COINS
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB callback if the user attempted to purchase a SwarmStoreListing but has an insufficient number of Swarm Coins.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PURCHASE_CANCELED

        public static final int PURCHASE_CANCELED
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB if the purchase was intentionally cancelled by the user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int PURCHASE_SUCCESS
        The value returned by the ItemPurchaseCB if the purchase was successful.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • id

        public int id
        The unique identification number of this SwarmStoreListing.

      • item

        public SwarmStoreItem item
        The SwarmStoreItem that is contained by this SwarmStoreListing.

      • title

        public java.lang.String title
        The title of this SwarmStoreListing.

      • price

        public int price
        The number of SwarmCoins that it will cost the user to purchase this SwarmStoreListing.

      • quantity

        public int quantity
        The quantity of SwarmStoreItems associated with this SwarmStoreListing. For example, if you are selling 5 potions in this SwarmStoreListing, then the quantity value is 5. If you are selling a single item in this SwarmStore listing, then the quantity value is 1.

      • imageUrl

        public java.lang.String imageUrl
        The URL that points to the image associated with this SwarmStoreListing. The image at this URL can be retrieved and shown to the user.

      • orderId

        public int orderId
        Identifies this Listing's position in the Swarm Store list. The Listing with an orderId of 0 will be shown first in the list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwarmStoreListing

        public SwarmStoreListing()

    • Method Detail

      • purchase

        public void purchase(Context c,
            SwarmStoreListing.ItemPurchaseCB cb)
        This method is called when the user purchases a SwarmStoreListing.
        Parameters:
        c - The applicable context (i.e. "this").
        cb - An ItemPurchaseCB callback that returns from the server after a call to purchase. The ItemPurchaseCB callback returns in purchaseSuccess() if the SwarmStoreListing was successfully purchased. the ItemPurchaseCB callback returns in purchaseFailed with an integer reason that contains a failure mode error code. The failure mode error codes are defined in this SwamStoreListing class.

      • purchase

        public static void purchase(Context context,
            int listingId)
        Call this method to prompt the user to purchase the SwarmStoreListing specified by the listingId.
        Parameters:
        context - The applicable context (i.e. "this").
        listingId - The StoreItemListing ID number shown in the Swarm Admin Panel.

      • purchase

        public static void purchase(Context context,
            int listingId,
            SwarmStoreListing.ItemPurchaseCB cb)
        Call this method to prompt the user to purchase the SwarmStoreListing specified by the listingId.
        Parameters:
        context - The applicable context (i.e. "this").
        listingId - The StoreItemListing ID number shown in the Swarm Admin Panel.
        cb - An ItemPurchaseCB callback that returns from the server after a call to purchase. The ItemPurchaseCB callback returns in purchaseSuccess() if the SwarmStoreListing was successfully purchased. the ItemPurchaseCB callback returns in purchaseFailed with an integer reason that contains a failure mode error code. The failure mode error codes are defined in this SwamStoreListing class.
